channel.title: facebook on Amoghavarsha
channel.description: Recent content in facebook on Amoghavarsha

item.title: Facebook And Midnight Mass
item.description: I recently joined Facebook. It’s been some odd 6-7 years ago since I left the platform. The reason for rejoining Facebook is fairly simple - Communities. Well, the social media platform has been around for many years, and their penetration is massive. There are so many old tech, travel, food, entrepreneurship communities thriving on Facebook. Even though I’m not a big fan of doom scrolling, lately I’ve been active in programming communities and I am trying to answer the majority of questions there.
